data.title: Famous Birthdays on March 9
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 9th of March. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on March 9.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 228

Hugh IV, Duke of Burgundy, French crusader, born in Villaines-en-Duesmois, France (d. 1271)
